What it is: Identifies parts of your personality built for survival rather than authenticity.
How to use it: Describe your behavior in high-stakes situations. Ask AI to isolate which traits serve safety over truth.
What it changes: Restores contact with the authentic self and enables congruent expression.

What it is: Maps who charges and drains your emotional energy.
How to use it: List your regular interactions. Ask AI to model your net energetic gain or loss from each person.
What it changes: Improves boundary hygiene and social selection.

What it is: Explores the unexpressed sub-identities within your personality matrix.
How to use it: Describe your dominant traits. Ask AI to speculate on the hidden or repressed counterparts.
What it changes: Expands self-concept complexity and unlocks untapped behavior patterns.

What it is: Estimates how much truth you're sacrificing for safety.
How to use it: Describe your behavior in a risky relationship. Ask AI to calculate the ratio of honesty to self-protection.
What it changes: Clarifies communication trade-offs and supports calculated transparency.

What it is: Reveals emotional debts you believe you still owe or are owed.
How to use it: List lingering conflicts. Ask AI to detect unspoken debts of guilt, shame, or obligation.

What it is: Quantifies where and how you're unconsciously sabotaging your independence.
How to use it: Describe three areas where you feel stuck. Ask AI to find internal dependency loops.
What it changes: Increases psychological freedom and strategic self-reliance.

What it is: Detects when you're using spiritual or intellectual tools to skip emotional processing.
How to use it: Describe a recent spiritual or philosophical insight. Ask AI if itâ€™s being used to avoid a feeling.
What it changes: Restores emotional integration and stops spiritual detachment loops.

What it is: Traces how past actions are still generating consequences today.
How to use it: Describe a regret. Ask AI how the ripple of that choice is still manifesting.
What it changes: Makes karmic chains visible and guides corrective action.

What it is: Detects approval-seeking that masquerades as authenticity.
How to use it: Describe something you posted or shared. Ask AI to assess what percentage was for real connection vs. status.
What it changes: Recalibrates social intention and promotes sincere expression.

What it is: Reveals how much energy you're spending to avoid re-experiencing a wound.
How to use it: Describe a protective pattern. Ask AI to calculate how much bandwidth it consumes to maintain.
What it changes: Frees up life-force previously spent on defense.
